How many people are affected by Crouzonodermoskeletal syndrome ?,Crouzonodermoskeletal syndrome is rare; this condition is seen in about 1 person per million.,GHR,Crouzonodermoskeletal syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Crouzonodermoskeletal syndrome ?,Mutations in the FGFR3 gene cause Crouzonodermoskeletal syndrome.  The FGFR3 gene provides instructions for making a protein that is involved in the development and maintenance
